summary: Added a new role-content-card to leader.html mentioning Bright's role as one of the coordinators of Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology summer school camp for 2025. The new card was added after the Church Leadership section, bringing the total leadership roles displayed to four: Kganya Ya Lefase, Family Leadership, Church Leadership, and Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology.
current_status: Leader page updated with new coordinator role at Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology summer school camp for 2025. The page now displays four distinct leadership roles, showcasing Bright's diverse leadership experience across business, family, church, and educational institutions.
